meanings.definition: The act of erasing or removing something
meanings.sent1: She made erasures on her drawing to correct the mistake.
meanings.sent2: The erasures on the paper showed where the errors were.
meanings.sent3: The erasures on the document made it look like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a book full of erasures, fading with time.
meanings.sent5: The erasures on the whiteboard were a testament to her meticulous editing.

meanings.definition: Marks or areas where something has been erased or removed
meanings.sent1: The erasures on the chalkboard were still visible.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the erasures on the wall where the graffiti used to be.
meanings.sent3: The erasures on the painting gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a canvas with countless erasures, each telling a story.
meanings.sent5: The erasures on the map revealed hidden paths and treasures.
